1.1.name: wordpress/google-for-page
1.1.description:
• Add Google+ Badge or Icon to your wordpress.
  • Display Badge in different languages
  • Very simple configuration.

Visit plugin site: http://www.darkomitrovic.com/wp-plugin/google-plus-page/
